body:
Hey guys, I'm really bored right now so imma add a little 'game' into the forums:

When you ate something, no matter what it was, would you rather it taste absolutely horrible and disgusting at first and then after a few seconds be completely delicious or the other way round?

Comment below :)

Id rather disgusting then delicious because then there would be no bad after taste left in your mouth :O

title: Would You Rather?
